scripts.build: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-backend
scripts.docker:build-configured: npm run build && docker build --build-arg VITE_PEERJS_SERVER_HOST=peer.floriantoenjes.com --build-arg VITE_PEERJS_SERVER_PORT=443 --build-arg VITE_TURN_SERVER_URL=turns:turn.floriantoenjes.com -t florians-realtime-chat:$npm_package_version .
scripts.minikube:build: npm run docker:build-configured && minikube image load florians-realtime-chat:$npm_package_version
